abilities.name: Shuriken
abilities.description: Launches a spinning blade of pain, dealing high damage and impaling enemies to walls.

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.description: Drops a smoke bomb that stuns enemies and obscures their vision, rendering Ash invisible for a short time.

abilities.name: Teleport
abilities.description: Ash teleports towards the target, bringing him into melee range and making enemies vulnerable to finishers.

abilities.name: Blade Storm
abilities.description: Project fierce shadow clones of Ash upon groups of distant enemies. Join the fray using Teleport.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: Ash is great for players looking for a stealthier approach to combat. Lethal abilities are complemented by powers of distraction.

components.name: Chassis
components.description: Chassis component of the Ash Warframe.

components.name: Neuroptics
components.description: Neuroptics component of the Ash Warframe.

components.name: Orokin Cell
components.description: Ancient energy cell from the Orokin era.Locations: Ceres, Saturn, and Orokin Derelicts.

components.name: Systems
components.description: Systems component of the Ash Warframe.

description: Ash is great for players looking for a stealthier approach to combat. Lethal abilities are complemented by powers of distraction.
name: Ash
passiveDescription: Bleed effects inflicted on enemies do |DAMAGE|% increased damage and last |DURATION|% longer.

patchlogs.name: Update 28: The Deadlock Protocol
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Ash Shroud’s arm blades not animating during his Bladestorm ability.
Fixed the TennoCon 2020 Syandana clipping with Mirage and Ash Shroud Skin lower body.

patchlogs.name: Nightwave Series 3: Glassmaker: Hotfix 27.5.1
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Ash’s Helmet having a vestigial tail in Leverian. 
Fixed floating text in Ash’s Leverian.

patchlogs.name: Nightwave Series 3: Glassmaker: Update 27.5.0
patchlogs.additions:
With time and fire the truth of bone is revealed. The signature Syandana of Ash Shroud.
Born of heat and cold as death, this is the signature bow skin for Ash Shroud.
All that remains is blood and dust. Become the shadow with the Ash Shroud Collection, which includes the cold-blooded Ash Shroud Skin, the venerable Causta Bow Skin and the forged-from-fire-and-bone Cremata Syandana.
patchlogs.changes: A new Leverian has been added for Ash! Drusus has a new tale to tell about....The Scoria!

patchlogs.name: Warframe Revised: Update 27.2.0
patchlogs.changes:
Ash: 65 to 100
Ash Prime: 150 to 175

patchlogs.name: Empyrean: Prime Vault 27.1.1
patchlogs.changes: Vauban Prime and Ash Prime, as well as their signature Prime Weapons, Accessories, have reentered the Prime Vault and have been removed from the drop tables.

patchlogs.name: Atlas Prime: Update 25.8.0 + 25.8.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked Ash Ryuga Helmet ponytail cloth as per creators request to fix deformation.

patchlogs.name: TennoGen & Nightwave Episode 5: Hotfix 25.7.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Ash Ryuga Helmet missing its ponytail cloth.

patchlogs.name: Arbitrations Revisited: Hotfix 25.7.6
patchlogs.changes: Increased brightness of Ash’s Bladestorm mark slightly to improve visibility.

patchlogs.name: Saint of Altra: Update 25.7.0
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed the Atavist Prime Right Shoulder Plate clipping on the Ash Koga skin. 
Fixed Ash’s Rising Storm combo building much faster than intended due to an interaction with Relentless Combo and a Gunblade weapon.

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Hotfix 25.2.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed casting Ash’s Teleport during Bladestorm resulting in a loss of proper functionality as reported here: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/1087292-ash-blade-storm-bug/.

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Update 25.1.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Zanuka being unable to capture Hildryn, Wisp, Revenant, Chroma, Frost, Excalibur, Inaros, Nova, Vauban, Volt, Wukong, Ash, Hydroid, Mag, Trinity, Titania and Valkyr.

patchlogs.name: Buried Debts: Hotfix 24.5.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed clones from Ash’s Blade Storm (Rising Storm) and Equinox’s Metamorphosis Augment (Duality) not using the proper loadout in Dojo Duels as reported here: https://www.reddit.com/r/Warframe/comments/b2hapq/this_is_what_happens_when_you_take_duality/

patchlogs.name: Buried Debts: Hotfix 24.4.4 + 24.4.4.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error when casting Ash’s Blade Storm ability.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.0.9
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Ash’s Fatal Teleport Augment Mod not functioning on the Plains of Eidolon or in Orb Vallis.
Fixed certain MOA Companion parts not turning invisible when cloaked with a Warframe ability (i.e. Loki’s Invisibility, Ash’s Smokescreen, etc).

patchlogs.name: Chimera: Update 23.10
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed numerous clipping issues Syandanas on Ash Prime, Hydroid, Trinity Prime, and Frost TennoGen Skins.

patchlogs.name: Mask of the Revenant: Hotfix 23.9.1
patchlogs.changes: Updated theme texture icons for all Warframe Skins/Helmets for Ash, Atlas, Banshee, Chroma, Ember and Equinox.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.20.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to instantly kill Infested Hives with Ash and certain Mods equipped.

patchlogs.name: Beasts of the Sanctuary: Update 22.19.0
patchlogs.changes: Ash can no longer Teleport to Cameras and Turrets, as it usually results in placing Ash outside of the map.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.17.0 + 22.17.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed persisting muffled sound when casting Ash’s Smoke Shadow Augment as reported here: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/935041-smoke-screen-persisting-muffled-sound/

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Zephyr Prime 22.16.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash’s Bladestorm ability timer not displaying ‘0’ when 0 enemies are marked.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.15.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash’s Smokescreen ending while in Operator causing sounds to be perpetually muffled when Transferring back to Ash.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.14.0
patchlogs.changes:
Fixed Ash’s Shuriken applying numerous Slash Status Effects to every enemy (even ones not hit) if in a group together (using Ferrox’s Alt Fire to group enemies closely). 
Fixed a script error when casting Bladestorm as Ash Prime.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.12.3
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Clients not having their melee combo counter increased for Ash’s clones hitting enemies in Bladestorm.
Fixed a script error when casting Ash’s Bladestorm.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed casting Ash’s Shuriken on a knocked down enemy resulting in the Slash Status Effect hitting several times a second, often killing the enemy outright. This was most commonly seen when using Zenurik’s Temporal Blast.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Blade Storm making Ash unarmed when it ends if he activates it while holding a Scanner.
Fixed Ash’s Blade Storm not removing the temporary melee weapon given to Ash if the only weapon he has is a Speargun (Javlok, Scourge, etc) and he's currently thrown the Speargun out when activating Blade Storm.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.changes: Ash’s idle smoke now reacts to lighting.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.2.0 + 21.2.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash’s Fatal Teleport Augment causing enemies to teleport up high if cast from up above.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.2
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked Ash’s Smoke Screen ability sound.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Hotfix 20.7.1
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Ash Fatal Teleport Augment teleporting enemies down through the floor in certain situations.
Fixed a crash related to Ash Prime's Teleport.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Update 20.7.0
patchlogs.changes: Ash’s Fatal Teleport Augment will now only rotate the target so their back is facing you (before would rotate to front or back) since many weapons don't have frontal finishers.
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed a case where Ash’s Fatal Teleport target may move too far away during the casting animation for the finisher to succeed.
Fixed a case where some tilesets would block Ash’s Fatal Teleport finishers.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.5.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash getting perpetually stuck when teleporting to a Death Orb.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Update 20.2.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash being able to insta-kill the Juggernaut by doing a finisher. Finishers are unable to be performed on the Juggernaut/Juggernaut Behemoth.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error when casting Ash’s Bladestorm

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.changes:
Choosing the default Ash skin for Ash Prime now removes all Ash Prime details.
Ash’s passive in Conclave changed to Bleed debuff from hits with weapons from the Nikana family.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Hotfix 19.12.1+19.12.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash’s Noble/Agile animations not functioning properly with the Javlok.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Update 19.12.0
patchlogs.changes: Replaced the Ash Prime Neuroptics Blueprint with Ash Prime Systems Blueprint in the Neo N5 relic as intended.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed positioning of the Quaro Armor on Ash’s Koga Skin.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash’s Bladestorm not marking targets when Heightened Reflexes is equipped in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.11.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash’s Bladestorm death FX not showing up for Clients.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.10.1+19.10.1.1
patchlogs.changes: You can now access Chat while Ash is performing his Bladestorm.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash continually performing Bladestorm finishers when attempting to melee after casting the ability as Client.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.6.0 + 19.6.0.1
patchlogs.additions: Nidus, Ash Koga Profile and Frost Harka Icons have been added to the Market for purchase!

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.6+19.5.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script crash in Ash's Teleport ability.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.5.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error caused by Ash’s Bladestorm ability.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash Carabid & Banshee Echo helmets not being improved by Arcanes

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Update 19.4 + 19.4.1
patchlogs.fixes: Ash Carabid Helmet by artarrwen

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Update 19.2.0
patchlogs.changes:
Ash’s Smoke Screen
Reduced the duration of Ash's Smoke Screen in Conclave.
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Ash not being able to Teleport to Shrapnel Mine, Kuva Fortress Turrets and the Grineer Blunt. 
Fixed ragdolling an enemy (without killing them) causes Ash’s Blade Storm marks to disappear. 
Fixed Ash’s Blade Storm marks being embedded inside enemies while levitating.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: 19.1.0 Ash Revisited
patchlogs.changes:
The War Within: 19.1.0 Ash Revisited:
Blade Storm now has a new 'Mark Enemy' mode that is activated when you hit 4. Ash enters target mode, which you can freely target enemies with your reticule up to 3 times each for attack. Once you're satisfied, press 4 again, Blade Storm begins and all targeted enemies are attacked!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash Shuriken wonky aiming and bumped up the turn rate so they hit targets much more consistently.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 19.0.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed issues with an awkward heavy landing sound on Ash's Teleport.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with secondary weapons clipping into Ash Prime

patchlogs.name: Recurring Nightmares
patchlogs.changes: Returned Ash's Bladestorm damage to normal gamemode values in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed receiving duplicate items in the End of Mission screen when picking up Blueprint drops (Oberon, Ash, etc.).

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview
patchlogs.changes:
Conclave Arsenal now has Ability descriptions specific to Conclave for the following Frames: Ash, Banshee, Hydroid, Inaros, Ivara, Loki, Mag, Mesa, Nekros, Nezha, Nova, Nyx, Rhino, Saryn, Titania, Valkyr, Vauban and Volt.
Ash’s Shuriken is now a single projectile in Conclave. Its damage has been boosted to more than a single one used to do but not as much as both combined.
Ash’s Shuriken will now only seek targets you aim at in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove
patchlogs.changes:
Ash now has increased Mobility while invisible in Conclave
Increased animation speed and range of Ash’s Teleport To in Conclave
Decreased duration of Ash’s Smokescreen in Conclave

patchlogs.name: Update: Specters of the Rail
patchlogs.changes: Projectiles spawned by an ability will be deflected when they encounter a Nullifier bubble. For example, Ember’s Fireball and Ash’s Shuriken will be deflected.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash Prime missing his helmet dangles in the Codex diorama.

patchlogs.name: Update: Lunaro
patchlogs.fixes:
•    Fixed some cases where Ash’s Fatal Teleport Augment wouldn't auto finish enemies moving quickly.
•    Fixed Ash’s Fatal Teleport Augment targeting dead bodies.
•    Fixed Ash’s Fatal Teleport Augment failing to activate when moving too quickly (bullet jump, etc.).

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.13.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash’s Arcane Locust and Arcane Scorpion Helmet not being tradable.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.13.0: TennoGen, Passives, & Reworks
patchlogs.fixes:
•    Fixed Ash skipping his throwing animation when consecutively casting Shuriken. 
•    Fixed Ash’s Fatal Teleport augment Mod not performing finishers on enemies immune to being stunned. (Arctic Eximus, etc.)

patchlogs.name: Update 18.9.0
patchlogs.changes: •    Reduced the damage and range of Ash's Bladestorm in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.7.0
patchlogs.fixes: •    Fixed performance issues for Hosts caused by using Ash’s Bladestorm.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.5.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash's Teleport not staggering enemies.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.5: Sands of Inaros
patchlogs.fixes: Increase the range and damage of Ash’s Bladestorm in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.10 & Tactial Alert: Divine Will
patchlogs.changes: Ash now has new audio FX on Bladestorm’s finishing attacks.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.3
patchlogs.changes:
Ash 
Ash's Bladestorm range has been increased from 8m to 10m in Conclave.
Ash’s Smoke Shadow Augment Mod now affects ally NPCs.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.changes:
Increased the duration of Ash’s Smokescreen in PvP.
Increased the range of Ash’s Teleport in PvP.
Casting Ash’s Teleport will now cause players to drop the Cephalon.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.2
patchlogs.changes:
Increased animation speed of Ash’s teleport in PvP.
Ash’s Shurikens now do Puncture damage in PvP.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Prisma Daedalus Shoulder Armor sitting incorrectly on Ash Prime.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Loki and Ash being unable to damage themselves with explosive weapons while invisible.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2.4
patchlogs.changes: Ash's Bladestorm damage reduced in PvP

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash`s Bladestorm becoming caught in an infinite loop in PvP, causing invulnerability and idle clones.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash’s Bladestorm not knocking players down when used by Clients.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Tethra’s Doom Quantum Emblem not sitting properly on Ash Prime.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes:
This helmet is worn by Ash, increases duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latch while sacrificing Power Efficiency.
Ash's Parts have been moved off Tyl Regor to Manics (they now drop like Oberon parts)
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash’s Bladestorm locking players into a multi-strike animation against Synthesis targets.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.5
patchlogs.changes: Ash’s Blade Storm is now affected by the Steel Charge Aura Mod.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.4
patchlogs.fixes:
Note: The changes to T3D tier C drops didn't dilute the chance of getting the Ash Prime part you're after -
they just added ducat-variety to the common drops.  Ash Prime BP still has the same drop rate as before.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.3
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed players being unable to put Arcanes on Ash Prime’s helmet (for real this time 
this fix resolves anyone who had purchased Ash Prime vs crafting!) This should also fix some users with un-Arcaneable Volt Prime helmets.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.2
patchlogs.changes: Please note that all tiers of Prime Access now include Carrier Prime with this Hotfix. Once the hotfix is live, we will be running a script to give all eligible accounts their Carrier Primes. An account is eligible for Carrier Prime if they have purchased the Covert or Shuriken Ash Prime Access packs. We will let you know when the script is complete.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash Prime Helmet not available for Arcane Enhancements.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.11: Ash Prime + Hotfix 16.11.1
patchlogs.changes: Ash and Ash Prime are now available for use in Conclave.
patchlogs.fixes:
An elusive and lethal force, Ash Prime storms into Prime Access.  Get Ash Prime Access now and make the newest Primes yours -
including Ash Prime, Vectis Prime and Carrier Prime. Plus, stock up on discounted Platinum and get Exclusive Gear available only through Prime Access!
Fixed Ash, Vectis and Carrier parts not dropping for players in the Void.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue that would cause player’s map to break when trying to type during Ash’s Bladestorm animation.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.3.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue that would occur when using Ash’s Blade Storm when inside Limbo’s Rift.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.3.1 + 16.3.1.1 + Tactical Alert
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash getting stuck in Bladestorm animations when used on Zanuka.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash’s Bladestorm looping on a single target if that target became immune to the ability after it Bladestorm had begun as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/427783-ash-bladestorm-and-nullifiers/

patchlogs.name: Update 16.1: Volt Prime
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Ash’s Bladestorm when one of his targets becomes Mind Controlled mid-Bladestorm as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/425163-blade-storm-mind-control-horrible-bug/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash's Teleport targeting player sentinels.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash’s Smoke Shadow Augment Mod not functioning properly.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.14.0
patchlogs.fixes: Add style so good it's practically toxic with the new Saryn Noggle, distract Liset guests from that mess your Kubrow made with the Ash Noggle, or give your Liset that angry Corpus boss vibe with the Alad V Noggle. The best part? You'll never have to dust them!

patchlogs.name: Update 15.6.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash’s Bladestorm targeting enemies immune to Abilities after the initial target is killed.

patchlogs.name: Mesa Update
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Ash’s Bladestorm disabling all stealth finishers after use.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.1.2
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed an issue with Ash’s Smoke Shadow Augment lasting forever if cast by a client who subsequently quits the mission.
Fixed an issue with Ash’s Smoke Shadow affecting Defense targets.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Archwing
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed an issue with the Slipstream Nova profile icon pack stating that the purchase will receive Locust Ash profile icons.
Fixed several issues with Ash’s Bladestorm losing functionality after activating the ability while holding a datamass, powercell, or other secondary items.
Fixed Companions being completely invisible when under the effect of Ash's Smokescreen.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.10.2 + 14.10.2.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash’s Bladestorm being continually in use when casted while holding a power cell/datamass.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with the Harlequin Mirage Helmet Blueprint incorrectly appearing as the Arcane Scorpion Ash Helmet Blueprint. Please note that we will be re-running a functioning Harlequin Helmet alert at a similar time as the broken one, but with a doubled duration.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.9.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Loki Enigma profile icon packs giving players a Locust Ash profile icon instead – we believe this was an organized prank by our stealthy frames.

patchlogs.name: Update 14.7.0: Operation Gate Crash!
patchlogs.fixes:
PvP Change: Ash’s Bladestorm reduced to 0.25 damage multiplier from 0.5.
Fixed issue where Ash could Bladestorm targets at panels in Interception missions, rendering them ignored by future enemy AI.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.11
patchlogs.fixes:
Reduced the amount of damage dealt by the bleeding proc associated with Ash's Shuriken ability in Dark Sector conflicts.
Reduced the amount of damage of Ash's Bladestorm in Dark Sector conflicts.

patchlogs.name: Update 14: The Mad Cephalon
patchlogs.changes: Improved the performance of Ash's Smoke Screen on lower end PC's.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 13.9.1
patchlogs.fixes:
Ash's Shuriken is now registered as a silent projectile.
Ash’s Teleport now indicates enemies are vulnerable to finishers.
Fixed an issue with Ash’s Blade Storm that could potentially lead to a loss of Warframe functionality.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.8.0: Breeding Grounds
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with players getting stuck in Ash’s Bladestorm.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 13.5.2 + 13.5.3
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed an issue with kills made by Ash’s Bladestorm clones not counting towards the players total kill count.
Fixed an animation issue that would appear when performing Ash’s Bladestorm with no melee weapon equipped.
Fixed an issue with the attacks from Ash’s Bladestorm clones not properly counting towards  the combo hit counter.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 13.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Bladestorm not forcing a Bleed Proc on targets that Ash (or clone) is attacking.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.5.0: Edo Armor & Nami Solo
patchlogs.changes:
Ash
Blade Storm has received a rework! Now when the ability is used Ash will conjure up to two separate clones which will go on the attack in addtion to the player! This will allow the player clear out large groups of enemies even quicker!
Fixed issue with Ash being unable to use finishers on enemies that had been previously targeted by Bladestorm.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.3.0: Pack Hunters
patchlogs.changes:
Ash' Blade Storm will now deal multiplied damage based on the current Combo Hit multiplier
Tweaked the ability and energy visuals on numerous Warframes including Rhino, Frost, Nova, Ash, Banshee, Zephyr, Vauban, Volt and Valkyr.

patchlogs.name: Update 13: Dark Sectors
patchlogs.changes: Sentinels are now invincible during Ash's Bladestorm.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash being able to suffer shield damage during Bladestorm.

patchlogs.name: Update 10.6.0: The Vectis!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed and response to complaints that Ash’s Blade Storm will sometimes ignore enemies who are standing right beside the initial target.

patchlogs.name: Update 10.5.0: The Gradivus Dilemma
patchlogs.changes: Fixed Ash’s Bladestorm ability that would sometimes ignore enemies who are standing right beside the initial target.

patchlogs.name: Update 10.4.0
patchlogs.changes: Fix for Ash "power in use" bug when using "Teleport" on defense target.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 9.5.1
patchlogs.changes: Tweak to Ash’s new custom idle.

patchlogs.name: Update 9.5: Operation Arid Fear
patchlogs.changes: Added animation and sounds for Ash’s Bladestorm ability vs. Ancients
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed issue with Ash Bladestorm where the Ash’s arm may be stuck in his shoulder.
Fixed issue where Ash would become invincible after using Bladestorm on clients.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 9.4: Double Affinity Weekend!
patchlogs.fixes: Fix for weapons not returning after using Ash’s Bladestorm

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 9.3
patchlogs.fixes:
Ash Bladestorm ability deals increasing damage as it levels up.
Fixed Ash Smoke Screen VFX to last as long as the ability.
Fixed Ash's smoke screen from applying effect to clan emblem icon. Emblem now just goes invisible.
Fixed issue of random loss of functionality when using Ash's Bladestorm ability.
Fixed some "stuck" issues relating to Ash's Bladestorm ability.

patchlogs.name: Update 9: Vor's Revenge
patchlogs.fixes: Improved color tinting on Ash’s smoke armband—more subtle.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash’s Smoke Screen where he’d hold both melee and primary weapon.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 8.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: fixed issues with Ash's Bladestorm on client

patchlogs.name: 8.0.5: It's Getting Hot(Fix) In Here
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash Shuriken and Nyx Psychic Bolts not functioning correctly on clients

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 8.0.3: Some Like It Hotter!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash  Chassis tag appearing on incorrect items.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 8.0.2 : Comin In' Hot!
patchlogs.fixes:
Latron Prime recipes reading "Ash Chassis" requirement
General bugs with "Ash Chassis" appearing where not intended

patchlogs.name: Update 8: Rise Of The Warlords
patchlogs.changes: Ash's Shuriken improvements added: it now seeks targets and multiple projectiles added at higher ranks.

patchlogs.name: Update 7.9.0: The Glaive
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash’s Bladestorm power, it will no longer target turrets or security cameras.

patchlogs.name: Update 7.1 Hot-Fixes
patchlogs.fixes: -Fix Sentinel Cloak removed Ashes and Lokis cloaking abilities

patchlogs.name: Update 6.5 Hotfixes
patchlogs.fixes: Ash Shuriken crash fixed!

patchlogs.name: Update 6.3 Hotfixes
patchlogs.fixes: Bladestorm improvements: Ash is now invulnerable when using Bladestorm.

patchlogs.name: 5.4 Hotfixes
patchlogs.fixes: -Energy cost changes for Volt and Ash.
